archimate:Driver.name: Ensure continous operations for all DPS services in Norway
archimate:Driver.documentation:
Sven-Erik Espeland has the overall organizational responsibility to ensure all DPS services (legacy/new) are operated properly in Norway
DPS Continous Delivery teams are responsible of running the continous services. All of the functions are within this group of stakeholders, including IAM environments (COS/IDAR)
